DOC.brief_title: Cardioprotective Effects Green Tea Versus Maté Intake
DOC.detailed_description: Recommendations lifestyle dietary content change often make primary prevention improvement many health condition , include cardiovascular disease . For century , green tea ( Camellia sinensis ) link good health . Nowadays , consider functional food physiological benefit , mainly term cardiovascular prevention . Green tea consider one best source phenolic compound , posse antioxidant property may contribute reduction risk cardiovascular disease . Lesser-known worldwide , widely consume southern Latin America country , yerba mate tea ( Ilex paraguariensis ) also good source phenolic compound . The antioxidant capacity green tea extensively study ; however , study report antioxidant property maté tea even great green tea . For reason , present study aim compare possible effect oral ingestion maté green tea lipid inflammatory profile southern Brazilian population .
DOC.criteria: age 3560 year nontreated dyslipidemia ( TC > 200mg/dL and/or TG > 150 mg/dL and/or HDLc < 40 mg/dL men 50mg /dL woman ) BMI 2535 Kg/m² use indication use lipidlowering agent and/or vitamin supplement nonsteroid anti inflammatory use hormone replacement therapy contraceptive use pregnancy nursing unexplained weight loss ( > 2 Kg ) 2 month study alter hepatic function sign inform consent
